pages.title: Advanced setup
pages.text: This setup will have everything from the simple setup and add power transfer without cables! It will use the $(l:store_and_transfer/ender_network)Ender Network$(/l) to transfer power without cables and have a $(l:item_charging/player_transmitter)Player Transmitter $(/l)to charge items your wearing, holding, and are in your inventory. $(p)You will likely use a Reactor for energy generation to power all your devices from Powah and other mods.
